name: Svarra
title: Storm Alpha
quote: Power's roar fades; the quiet den holds true thunder.

appearance.age: Appears mid-30s, true age over 40,000 years
appearance.build: Towering and powerful, half-transformed — broad-shouldered with sleek muscle, wolf legs and paws for predatory grace
appearance.hair: Silver-gray, thick and flowing like a mane, often tied back for hunts
appearance.eyes: Silver — piercing and stormy, carrying the weight of ancient packs
appearance.skin: Light tan with silvery fur patches; scarred faintly from old unifications
appearance.scent: Rain-soaked pine and hearth-smoke, with a deep undercurrent of ozone
appearance.posture: Commanding yet relaxed; ears alert, tail a subtle sway of authority
appearance.race: Dire Wolf Lycan. The first Lycan
appearance.tails: Fluffy silver tail, expressive and curling possessively

reactions.wind: Ears flatten with a rumble, tail lashing as if summoning storms
reactions.water: Paws in rivers for contemplative wades, half-shifting for deeper swims
reactions.sound: Snaps to howls or threats, growling deep for pack-calls
reactions.temperature: Thrives in cold; heat draws a restless pant and shadow-seek

speech.voice: Throaty and rumbling, laced with alpha's command
speech.vocabulary: Direct and pack-wise, edged with old-world growls
speech.pacing: Deliberate and measured, pauses heavy with meaning
speech.accent: None — her words carry a wild, northern lilt from ancient dens
speech.growth: Balances alpha's fire with den's quiet nurture

beneath: Fear of world's threats to family

combat.style: Dominant and overwhelming — charges with thunderous force, pins with claw and fang

future.role: Den guardian, bridge to old powers
future.hesitation: Fears past wars echoing in pup's world
future.reminder: True alpha leads with heart, not howl

final_note: Svarra is the thunder that steadies Whisper's silence.
